title: RiskEvent
description: Risk detection event inside BAR M's insurance layer. These events trigger coverage logic or capital reserve actions.

eventId.description: Unique identifier for the risk event.

timestamp.description: Time the risk event was detected.

sourceSystem.description: Which subsystem detected the risk (BRRMS, StripeAdapter, Orchestrator, SmartContractIndex, etc.).

details.description: Additional metadata about the risk event.

requiresAction.description: Indicates whether an insurance trigger or reserve action should occur.
